# Abdirahman Ahmed (Maano) - Personal Portfolio

> Full-stack developer and entrepreneur originally from Somalia, based in Stockholm, Sweden. API & AI tools builder. Expert in healthcare technology, fintech APIs, security testing, and cultural preservation. Building APIs, agents, automation workflows, and open data systems that ship in the real world. Organizations: MotherGenome. Philosophy: "Ship beats perfect."

## Identity

- Name: Abdirahman Ahmed (Maano)
- Location: Stockholm, Sweden (originally from Somalia)
- Pronouns: he/him
- Languages: Somali, English, Swedish
- Education: Cybersecurity degree
- Portfolio: https://abdirahman.net

## Core Pages

- [About](https://abdirahman.net/about): Professional background, skills showcase, expertise
- [Projects](https://abdirahman.net/projects): Portfolio of projects across healthcare, fintech, security, geography, cultural preservation, and open source
- [Blog](https://abdirahman.net/blog): Project updates, tech insights, tutorials, announcements
- [Contact](https://abdirahman.net/contact): Email and social links

## Key Projects

- **AfSomali Foundation** - Nonprofit preserving Somali language, culture, and heritage. Grammar checker, 70,000+ word dictionary, cultural archives, educational resources for diaspora. https://afsomali.org
- **WebClone** - Universal website cloner on PyPI: `pip install webclone-cli`. Clone any website in seconds. GitHub & PyPI.
- [DNA Analysis System](https://abdirahman.net/projects/dna-analysis-system): 609,424+ genetic variants, 32 disease risk scores, 19 drug response profiles, ML predictions (XGBoost/Bayesian/LSTM), health reports
- [IBAN & SWIFT Validator](https://abdirahman.net/projects/iban-swift-validator): 51,000+ banks, 204 countries. RapidAPI. Fraud detection, bulk processing.
- [TransferGalaxy](https://abdirahman.net/projects/transfergalaxy): Co-founded digital money transfer in Sweden. Regulated, low fees, for immigrants sending money home.
- [Somali Geography & Governance API](https://abdirahman.net/projects/somali-geo-api): Open-source API for Somalia. 36 regions, 148 districts, 26,046+ roads, 23 airports, 8 ports. GitHub: somali-geo-api.
- **Warya Security Suite** - Security testing framework: 77 tool categories (43 scanners + 30 utilities + 4 advanced modules), 180 scripts. Web, mobile (APK/IPA), and password security. Custom algorithms and AI integration. Built after Somalia's e-visa data breach (2025) exposed thousands of records; Somalia has little cybersecurityâ€”Warya addresses that gap. Private; no public link.
- [Somali Digital ID Readiness Toolkit](https://abdirahman.net/projects/somali-digital-id-toolkit): Open-source. Ed25519 signing, multilingual, offline-first. GitHub: somali-digital-id-toolkit.
- [FlyMind](https://abdirahman.net/projects/flymind): AI flight analytics. Google Flights scraping, price alerts, n8n integration. GitHub: flymind.
- [Email Validator API](https://abdirahman.net/projects/email-validator-api), [Somalia Phone Number API](https://abdirahman.net/projects/somalia-phone-number-api), [Nordic Phone Number API](https://abdirahman.net/projects/nordic-phone-number-api): RapidAPI validation APIs.
- [WhatsReplay](https://abdirahman.net/projects/whatsreplay): Historical events viewer. "What happened on this day in history."
- [Somali Children's Books](https://abdirahman.net/projects/somali-children-books): Amazon. Diaspora language and history. Folklore and education.

## What I'm Doing

Building open data systems; AI & automation (RAG, embeddings, agents); fintech APIs; cultural preservation; open source (PyPI, GitHub); rapid prototyping for diaspora and low-resource language communities.
